verses.roman:
kīrtana karite prabhu karilā gamana
saṅge cali' āise kājī ullasita mana

synonyms: kīrtana—chanting; karite—to perform; prabhu—the Lord; karilā—made; gamana—departure; saṅge—accompanying Him; cali'-walking; āise—comes; kājī—the Kazi; ullasita—jubilant; mana—mind.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu went back to perform kīrtana, and the Kazi, his mind jubilant, went with Him.
